Subskills.name: Scorched Lands
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of scorching aura.

Subskills.name: Sixt Degree Burns
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by scorching aura.

Subskills.name: Searing Burst
Subskills.description: Frequently unleash small bursts of fire dealing additional damage stunning monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Flaming Fissure
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to release a flaming fissure beneath monsters knocking them into the air dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Rapid Burning
Subskills.description: Increases the tick rate of scorching aura.

Subskills.name: Burnt Feet
Subskills.description: Increases your movement speed while scorching aura is active.

Subskills.name: IGNITE THE FLAMES
Subskills.description: Damaging monsters now builds up flaming ignition stacks unleashing a fiery pulse at max stacks.

Subskills.name: RELEASE THE CHAOS
Subskills.description: Ignite the flames now additionally unleashes piercing fireballs spiraling outwards dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Ground Blaze
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to slow monsters and light a blaze at their feet.

Subskills.name: Scorching Agony
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Burn Them All
Subskills.description: Inflicts burning for a portion of scorching auras damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Burning Soul
Subskills.description: Increases the damage of scorching aura based on your maximum life.

Subskills.name: Scorching Harvester
Subskills.description: Frequently send out fiery souls dealing damage replenishing a portion of your maximum life.
